# Write (ARCHIVED)

**Status:** DEPRECATED - Functionality distributed across hubs
**Migration:** Use specific hub commands instead

---

This command has been archived as part of Phase 3 optimization.
Writing functionality is now distributed:
- Academic writing: `/research` hub
- Documentation: `/site` hub
- Code documentation: `/code explain`

## Migration Guide

| Old Command | New Command |
|-------------|-------------|
| `/write docs` | `/site new` |
| `/write paper` | `/research` |
| `/write readme` | `/site new` |
| `/write comments` | `/code explain` |
